name: Adarkar Valkyrie
oracle_text: Flying, vigilance
{T}: When target creature other than Adarkar Valkyrie dies this turn, return that card to the battlefield under your control.
flavor_text: She doesn't escort the dead to the afterlife, but instead raises them to fight and die again.

name: Boreal Griffin
oracle_text: Flying
{S}: Boreal Griffin gains first strike until end of turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)
flavor_text:
"More than snow falls from the Boreal skies."
—Arkin Egilsson, skycaptain

name: Cover of Winter
oracle_text: Cumulative upkeep {S} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it. {S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)
If a creature would deal combat damage to you and/or one or more creatures you control, prevent X of that damage, where X is the number of age counters on Cover of Winter.
{S}: Put an age counter on Cover of Winter.

name: Darien, King of Kjeldor
oracle_text: Whenever you're dealt damage, you may create that many 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
flavor_text:
"With his dream of unification fulfilled, Darien became the last king of Kjeldor. Those who followed were known as the kings of New Argive."
—Kjeldor: Ice Civilization

name: Field Marshal
oracle_text: Other Soldier creatures get +1/+1 and have first strike. (They deal combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text: The Knights of Stromgald struck Darien's Roost from two sides. They would have caught Kjeldor in a pincer attack were it not for Darien's tacticians.

name: Gelid Shackles
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
{S}: Enchanted creature gains defender until end of turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)

name: Glacial Plating
oracle_text: Enchant creature

Cumulative upkeep {S} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it. {S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 for each age counter on Glacial Plating.

name: Jötun Grunt
oracle_text: Cumulative upkeep—Put two cards from a single graveyard on the bottom of their owner's library. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

name: Jötun Owl Keeper
oracle_text: Cumulative upkeep {W} or {U} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
When Jötun Owl Keeper dies, create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying for each age counter on it.

name: Kjeldoran Gargoyle
oracle_text: Flying, first strike
Whenever Kjeldoran Gargoyle deals damage, you gain that much life.
flavor_text: The gargoyles were taken from the walls of flooded Kjeldoran cities and brought upland to guard the outposts of New Argive.

name: Kjeldoran Javelineer
oracle_text: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
{T}: Kjeldoran Javelineer deals damage equal to the number of age counters on it to target attacking or blocking creature.

name: Kjeldoran Outrider
oracle_text: {W}: Kjeldoran Outrider gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "I listen to people. He sniffs the wind. And we both sense something big coming. Something very big."

name: Kjeldoran War Cry
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is 1 plus the number of cards named Kjeldoran War Cry in all graveyards.
flavor_text: King Darien's breath crystallized and fell to the frozen battlefield, but its command carried true to all soldiers of New Argive.

name: Luminesce
oracle_text: Prevent all damage that black sources and red sources would deal this turn.
flavor_text:
"The White Shield is not the burnished metal you lash to your forearm but the conviction that burns in your chest."
—Lucilde Fiksdotter,
leader of the Order of the White Shield

name: Martyr of Sands
oracle_text: {1}, Reveal X white cards from your hand, Sacrifice Martyr of Sands: You gain three times X life.
flavor_text: "Only in our vulnerability is there true power, and that power is life itself."

name: Ronom Unicorn
oracle_text: Sacrifice Ronom Unicorn: Destroy target enchantment.
flavor_text: The aberrant magic of the Rimewind drew the unicorns back from the northern wastes to do battle once again.

name: Squall Drifter
oracle_text: Flying
{W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor_text:
"The scouts claim the cold has malice, and a mind. I begin to believe them. Impassable drifts seem to appear before us at every turn."
—Aevar Borg, northern guide, journal entry

name: Sun's Bounty
oracle_text: You gain 4 life.
Recover {1}{W} (When a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {1}{W}. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, exile this card.)
flavor_text: "Heidar has forced the sun into hiding, but it has not forgotten us."

name: Sunscour
oracle_text: You may exile two white cards from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Destroy all creatures.

name: Surging Sentinels
oracle_text: First strike

Ripple 4 (When you cast this spell, you may reveal the top four cards of your library. You may cast any revealed cards with the same name as this spell without paying their mana costs. Put the rest on the bottom of your library.)

name: Swift Maneuver
oracle_text: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor_text: Darien's call to Yavimaya would have fallen red to the snow had it not been for the agility of the aesthir.

name: Ursine Fylgja
oracle_text: Ursine Fylgja enters the battlefield with four healing counters on it.
Remove a healing counter from Ursine Fylgja: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to Ursine Fylgja this turn.
{2}{W}: Put a healing counter on Ursine Fylgja.

name: Wall of Shards
oracle_text: Defender, flying
Cumulative upkeep—An opponent gains 1 life. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

name: White Shield Crusader
oracle_text: Protection from black
{W}: White Shield Crusader gains flying until end of turn.
{W}{W}: White Shield Crusader gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Honor your steed and it will carry you to great deeds—and bring you home to tell of them."

name: Woolly Razorback
oracle_text: Woolly Razorback enters the battlefield with three ice counters on it.
As long as Woolly Razorback has an ice counter on it, prevent all combat damage it would deal and it has defender.
Whenever Woolly Razorback blocks, remove an ice counter from it.

name: Adarkar Windform
oracle_text: Flying
{1}{S}: Target creature loses flying until end of turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)
flavor_text: Terisiare has only two kinds of weather: cold and weird.

name: Arcum Dagsson
oracle_text: {T}: Target artifact creature's controller sacrifices it. That player may search their library for a noncreature artifact card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle their library.
flavor_text: "Artifice sundered the world. It shall not again wreak such sorrow."

name: Balduvian Frostwaker
oracle_text: {U}, {T}: Target snow land becomes a 2/2 blue Elemental creature with flying. It's still a land.
flavor_text: "Whether frozen or fertile, the land is our ally. It awaits the call to battle."

name: Commandeer
oracle_text: You may exile two blue cards from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Gain control of target noncreature spell. You may choose new targets for it. (If that spell is an artifact, enchantment, or planeswalker, the permanent enters the battlefield under your control.)

name: Controvert
oracle_text: Counter target spell.
Recover {2}{U}{U} (When a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {2}{U}{U}. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, exile this card.)

name: Counterbalance
oracle_text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may reveal the top card of your library. If you do, counter that spell if it has the same converted mana cost as the revealed card.

name: Drelnoch
oracle_text: Whenever Drelnoch becomes blocked, you may draw two cards.
flavor_text: Adarkar's blank wastes make the mind wander—and stray thoughts are quickly caught and devoured.

name: Flashfreeze
oracle_text: Counter target red or green spell.
flavor_text:
"Nature? Fire? Bah! Both are chaotic and difficult to control. Ice is structured, latticed, light as a feather, massive as a glacier. In ice, there is power!"
—Heidar, Rimewind master

name: Frost Raptor
oracle_text: Flying
{S}{S}: Frost Raptor gains shroud until end of turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent. A creature with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor_text: The Rimewind wizards strove to perpetuate a magical winter. Their unnatural snows birthed unnatural beasts.

name: Frozen Solid
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
When enchanted creature is dealt damage, destroy it.
flavor_text:
"Guard, fetch me a mallet."
—Heidar, Rimewind master

name: Heidar, Rimewind Master
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Activate this ability only if you control four or more snow permanents.
flavor_text: "The umber stain of the Thaw will be bleached away. Once again the world will be sharp, white, perfect!"

name: Jokulmorder
oracle_text: Trample
Jokulmorder enters the battlefield tapped.
When Jokulmorder enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice five lands.
Jokulmorder doesn't untap during your untap step.
Whenever you play an Island, you may untap Jokulmorder.

name: Krovikan Mist
oracle_text: Flying
Krovikan Mist's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Illusions on the battlefield.
flavor_text: Plague-induced dreams became real as they swirled above Krov, mingling with the magical residue of the World Spell.

name: Krovikan Whispers
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Cumulative upkeep {U} or {B} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
You control enchanted creature.
When Krovikan Whispers is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you lose 2 life for each age counter on it.

name: Martyr of Frost
oracle_text: {2}, Reveal X blue cards from your hand, Sacrifice Martyr of Frost: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}.
flavor_text:
"Do not call the Balduvians barbaric. Their magic is as potent as it is primal."
—Zur the Enchanter

name: Perilous Research
oracle_text: Draw two cards, then sacrifice a permanent.
flavor_text: When the School of the Unseen fell, so many magical treasures lay abandoned that no amount of death could deter the stream of thieves and desperate scholars.

name: Rimefeather Owl
oracle_text: Flying
Rimefeather Owl's power and toughness are each equal to the number of snow permanents on the battlefield.
{1}{S}: Put an ice counter on target permanent.
Permanents with ice counters on them are snow.

name: Rimewind Cryomancer
oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Counter target activated ability. Activate this ability only if you control four or more snow permanents. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)
flavor_text: "The Thaw brings flooding, disease, and death. We will do all in our power to bring frigid peace back to the world."

name: Rimewind Taskmage
oracle_text: {1}, {T}: You may tap or untap target permanent. Activate this ability only if you control four or more snow permanents.
flavor_text: "Find solace in the sun? Burning, blinding, laying secrets bare? No, solace is found under the blanket of cold."

name: Ronom Serpent
oracle_text: Ronom Serpent can't attack unless defending player controls a snow land.
When you control no snow lands, sacrifice Ronom Serpent.
flavor_text: With the spread of Rimewind's sorcerous winter, snow dwellers reclaimed their places atop the food chain.

name: Rune Snag
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2} plus an additional {2} for each card named Rune Snag in each graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Concentration is key. Without it, a mage conjures nothing but a splitting headache."
—Zur the Enchanter

name: Surging Æther
oracle_text: Ripple 4 (When you cast this spell, you may reveal the top four cards of your library. You may cast any revealed cards with the same name as this spell without paying their mana costs. Put the rest on the bottom of your library.)
Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

name: Survivor of the Unseen
oracle_text: Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
{T}: Draw two cards, then put a card from your hand on top of your library.

name: Thermal Flux
oracle_text: Choose one —
• Target nonsnow permanent becomes snow until end of turn.
• Target snow permanent isn't snow until end of turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

name: Vexing Sphinx
oracle_text: Flying
Cumulative upkeep—Discard a card. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
When Vexing Sphinx dies, draw a card for each age counter on it.

name: Balduvian Fallen
oracle_text: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
Whenever Balduvian Fallen's cumulative upkeep is paid, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each {B} or {R} spent this way.

name: Chill to the Bone
oracle_text: Destroy target nonsnow creature.
flavor_text:
"Thick hides and layered armor won't help when I freeze you from the inside out."
—Heidar, Rimewind master

name: Chilling Shade
oracle_text: Flying
{S}: Chilling Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)
flavor_text: Rimewind necromancers caught travelers in mystical blizzards then trapped their spirits in the mist of their final frozen breaths.

name: Deathmark
oracle_text: Destroy target green or white creature.
flavor_text:
"I hope it's true that every snowflake is unique, because I never want to see one like this again. Now clean up that body."
—Thangbrand Gyrdsson, Kjeldoran patrol

name: Disciple of Tevesh Szat
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
{4}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Disciple of Tevesh Szat: Target creature gets -6/-6 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "You pray to Freyalise, but she cannot hear your pleas. It is Tevesh Szat who will claim your soul."

name: Feast of Flesh
oracle_text: Feast of Flesh deals X damage to target creature and you gain X life, where X is 1 plus the number of cards named Feast of Flesh in all graveyards.
flavor_text:
"Starving an army that feeds on its enemies is a sound strategy."
—Garza Zol, plague queen

name: Garza's Assassin
oracle_text: Sacrifice Garza's Assassin: Destroy target nonblack creature.

Recover—Pay half your life, rounded up. (When another creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay half your life, rounded up. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, exile this card.)

name: Grim Harvest
oracle_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
Recover {2}{B} (When a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {2}{B}. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, exile this card.)

name: Gristle Grinner
oracle_text: Whenever a creature dies, Gristle Grinner gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"There it was, clawing the ice as it chittered and clicked its teeth. We fled in horror before it unearthed its grisly meal."
—Aevar Borg, northern guide, journal entry

name: Gutless Ghoul
oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain 2 life.
flavor_text:
"Make sure those wretches feed only upon the plagued. The blood of the healthy is reserved for me alone."
—Garza Zol, plague queen

name: Haakon, Stromgald Scourge
oracle_text: You may cast Haakon, Stromgald Scourge from your graveyard, but not from anywhere else.
As long as Haakon is on the battlefield, you may play Knight cards from your graveyard.
When Haakon dies, you lose 2 life.

name: Herald of Leshrac
oracle_text: Flying

Cumulative upkeep—Gain control of a land you don't control. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
Herald of Leshrac gets +1/+1 for each land you control but don't own.
When Herald of Leshrac leaves the battlefield, each player gains control of each land they own that you control.

name: Krovikan Rot
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with power 2 or less.
Recover {1}{B}{B} (When a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {1}{B}{B}. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, exile this card.)

name: Krovikan Scoundrel
flavor_text: The few surviving humans of Krov would have welcomed the return of winter and its sterilizing cold. They often peered northward, hoping that the snow's edge had reached their infested city-tomb.

name: Martyr of Bones
oracle_text: {1}, Reveal X black cards from your hand, Sacrifice Martyr of Bones: Exile up to X target cards from a single graveyard.
flavor_text: Puppeteered by Heidar's icy hand, they were sacrificed to the Frost Marsh to raise Haakon's army.

name: Phobian Phantasm
oracle_text: Flying; fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
Cumulative upkeep {B} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

name: Phyrexian Etchings
oracle_text: Cumulative upkeep {B} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
At the beginning of your end step, draw a card for each age counter on Phyrexian Etchings.
When Phyrexian Etchings is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you lose 2 life for each age counter on it.

name: Rime Transfusion
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 and has "{S}: This creature can't be blocked this turn except by snow creatures." ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)
flavor_text: The unfortunates so transformed hungered not for flesh, but for warmth.

name: Rimebound Dead
oracle_text: {S}: Regenerate Rimebound Dead. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)
flavor_text:
"Tresserhorn is ours now. Dredge the lake and bring me all the bones you find. We'll build you a new army, the likes of which Terisiare has never seen."
—Heidar, Rimewind master, to Haakon

name: Soul Spike
oracle_text: You may exile two black cards from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Soul Spike deals 4 damage to any target and you gain 4 life.

name: Stromgald Crusader
oracle_text: Protection from white
{B}: Stromgald Crusader gains flying until end of turn.
{B}{B}: Stromgald Crusader gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "The White-Shielders think their code justifies their actions. In truth it only binds their hands."

name: Surging Dementia
oracle_text: Ripple 4 (When you cast this spell, you may reveal the top four cards of your library. You may cast any revealed cards with the same name as this spell without paying their mana costs. Put the rest on the bottom of your library.)
Target player discards a card.

name: Tresserhorn Skyknight
oracle_text: Flying
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Tresserhorn Skyknight by creatures with first strike.
flavor_text: Kjeldorans who fled battle were exiled to the wastes. Those who strayed near Tresserhorn were pressed into service in Haakon's army.

name: Void Maw
oracle_text: Trample
If another creature would die, exile it instead.
Put a card exiled with Void Maw into its owner's graveyard: Void Maw gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Zombie Musher
oracle_text: Snow landwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a snow land.)
{S}: Regenerate Zombie Musher. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)
flavor_text: The World Spell thawed their icy graves, promising rest in soft, quiet earth at last. But Heidar called them to duty for a twisted cause.

name: Balduvian Rage
oracle_text: Target attacking creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor_text:
"Let your heartbeat be the thunder in the valley. Let your swords be the lightning on the peaks."
—Lothar Lovisason, Balduvian chieftain

name: Balduvian Warlord
oracle_text: {T}: Remove target blocking creature from combat. Creatures it was blocking that hadn't become blocked by another creature this combat become unblocked, then it blocks an attacking creature of your choice. Activate this ability only during the declare blockers step.

name: Braid of Fire
oracle_text: Cumulative upkeep—Add {R}. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
flavor_text: "To a trained mind, the cold is but a momentary distraction."

name: Cryoclasm
oracle_text: Destroy target Plains or Island. Cryoclasm deals 3 damage to that land's controller.
flavor_text: The people of Terisiare had come to live on frozen fields as though on solid ground. Nothing reminded them of the difference more clearly than the rifts brought on by the Thaw.

name: Earthen Goo
oracle_text: Trample
Cumulative upkeep {R} or {G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
Earthen Goo gets +1/+1 for each age counter on it.

name: Fury of the Horde
oracle_text: You may exile two red cards from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

name: Goblin Furrier
oracle_text: Prevent all damage that Goblin Furrier would deal to snow creatures.
flavor_text: Clambering up and over the powdery slope, the goblin chanced upon a small furry thing. There they regarded each other: the goblin and his new pair of earmuffs.

name: Goblin Rimerunner
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature can't block this turn.
{S}: Goblin Rimerunner gains haste until end of turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)
flavor_text: Rimerunners set off avalanches to immobilize foes as well as to create more challenging slopes.

name: Greater Stone Spirit
oracle_text: Greater Stone Spirit can't be blocked by creatures with flying.
{2}{R}: Until end of turn, target creature gets +0/+2 and gains "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."
flavor_text: Having charted their way up the difficult face, the two mountaineers had to contend with the mountain's decision to stand up.

name: Icefall
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or land.
Recover {R}{R} (When a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {R}{R}. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, exile this card.)
flavor_text: As the Thaw met Terisiare, mountains shed their icy skins, crushing homes and hopes alike.

name: Karplusan Minotaur
oracle_text: Cumulative upkeep—Flip a coin. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
Whenever you win a coin flip, Karplusan Minotaur deals 1 damage to any target.
Whenever you lose a coin flip, Karplusan Minotaur deals 1 damage to any target of an opponent's choice.

name: Karplusan Wolverine
oracle_text: Whenever Karplusan Wolverine becomes blocked, you may have it deal 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"They're not easily trained. Fortunately, they already know how to kill."
—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian chieftain

name: Lightning Serpent
oracle_text: Trample, haste
Lightning Serpent enters the battlefield with X +1/+0 counters on it.
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Lightning Serpent.
flavor_text: Ice exploded into steam in its wake, hissing like a thousand serpents hailing their blazing master.

name: Lightning Storm
oracle_text: Lightning Storm deals X damage to any target, where X is 3 plus the number of charge counters on Lightning Storm.
Discard a land card: Put two charge counters on Lightning Storm. You may choose a new target for it. Any player may activate this ability but only if Lightning Storm is on the stack.

name: Lovisa Coldeyes
oracle_text: Each creature that's a Barbarian, a Warrior, or a Berserker gets +2/+2 and has haste.
flavor_text: "I lead my horde to the northwest. I won't return until the ice wizards fall and their fiendish contraptions are crushed!"

name: Magmatic Core
oracle_text: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
At the beginning of your end step, Magmatic Core deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures, where X is the number of age counters on it.

name: Martyr of Ashes
oracle_text: {2}, Reveal X red cards from your hand, Sacrifice Martyr of Ashes: Martyr of Ashes deals X damage to each creature without flying.
flavor_text: She turns ash into flame and burns enemies to ash.

name: Ohran Yeti
oracle_text: {2}{S}: Target snow creature gains first strike until end of turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)
flavor_text: When a snowdrift shows you its eyes, it's already too late.

name: Orcish Bloodpainter
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Orcish Bloodpainter deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Blood calls to blood.

name: Rimescale Dragon
oracle_text: Flying
{2}{S}: Tap target creature and put an ice counter on it. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)
Creatures with ice counters on them don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

name: Rite of Flame
oracle_text: Add {R}{R}, then add {R} for each card named Rite of Flame in each graveyard.
flavor_text: Deep beneath the ice, beneath the soil and the rock, Dominaria's fire still burned hot.

name: Skred
oracle_text: Skred deals damage to target creature equal to the number of snow permanents you control.
flavor_text:
"This close to Rimewind Keep, no avalanche is nature's doing."
—Ukoten, centaur chieftain

name: Stalking Yeti
oracle_text: When Stalking Yeti enters the battlefield, if it's on the battlefield, it deals damage equal to its power to target creature an opponent controls and that creature deals damage equal to its power to Stalking Yeti.
{2}{S}: Return Stalking Yeti to its owner's hand. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)

name: Surging Flame
oracle_text: Ripple 4 (When you cast this spell, you may reveal the top four cards of your library. You may cast any revealed cards with the same name as this spell without paying their mana costs. Put the rest on the bottom of your library.)
Surging Flame deals 2 damage to any target.

name: Thermopod
oracle_text: {S}: Thermopod gains haste until end of turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)
Sacrifice a creature: Add {R}.
flavor_text: Slicking the ice with its heated underside, the thermopod skates at great speed to overtake its prey.

name: Allosaurus Rider
oracle_text: You may exile two green cards from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Allosaurus Rider's power and toughness are each equal to 1 plus the number of lands you control.

name: Arctic Nishoba
oracle_text: Trample
Cumulative upkeep {G} or {W} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
When Arctic Nishoba dies, you gain 2 life for each age counter on it.

name: Aurochs Herd
oracle_text: Trample
When Aurochs Herd enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Aurochs card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
Whenever Aurochs Herd attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Aurochs.

name: Boreal Centaur
oracle_text: {S}: Boreal Centaur gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)
flavor_text: Those who used reindeer as beasts of burden knew to avoid the centaurs, who raged at the enslavement of their spirit-kin.

name: Boreal Druid
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}.
flavor_text: Some creatures are bound to the cold by Rimewind magic. Others seek it out, adapted by two thousand years of the Ice. The Boreal, where Heidar's frigid sway is strongest, is home to both.

name: Brooding Saurian
oracle_text: At the beginning of each end step, each player gains control of all nontoken permanents they own.
flavor_text:
"I have been trapped in the lizard's lair for days. It seems to regard me as its child and will not let me leave."
—Aevar Borg, northern guide, journal entry

name: Bull Aurochs
oracle_text: Trample
Whenever Bull Aurochs attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Aurochs.
flavor_text: The aurochs herd is content to graze—until the bull provides the dissenting urge to charge.

name: Freyalise's Radiance
oracle_text: Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
Snow permanents don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

name: Frostweb Spider
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Whenever Frostweb Spider blocks a creature with flying, put a +1/+1 counter on Frostweb Spider at end of combat.
flavor_text: Its white webs glitter, mimicking the frost on the tree's branches.

name: Hibernation's End
oracle_text: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

Whenever you pay Hibernation's End's cumulative upkeep, you may search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost equal to the number of age counters on Hibernation's End and put it onto the battlefield. If you do, shuffle your library.

name: Into the North
oracle_text: Search your library for a snow land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text:
"Our border lands fall under the grip of Heidar's second winter. Go forth and reclaim them for Yavimaya."
—Kaysa, elder druid of the Juniper Order

name: Karplusan Strider
oracle_text: Karplusan Strider can't be the target of blue or black spells.
flavor_text: The strider's long, loping gait is an adaptation that allows it to move quickly in deep snow.

name: Martyr of Spores
oracle_text: {1}, Reveal X green cards from your hand, Sacrifice Martyr of Spores: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Weep not for me. I will rise with the spring's new growth."

name: Mystic Melting
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor_text: The sun-hot glow radiated from the druids, leaving scattered metal in steaming pools as it passed.

name: Ohran Viper
oracle_text: Whenever Ohran Viper deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.
Whenever Ohran Viper deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.
flavor_text: The ohran viper is not cold-blooded. Its veins course with the same antigelid venom used to kill its prey.

name: Panglacial Wurm
oracle_text: Trample
While you're searching your library, you may cast Panglacial Wurm from your library.
flavor_text:
"Step lightly and we might be able to use it as a bridge."
—Ib Halfheart, goblin tactician

name: Resize
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
Recover {1}{G} (When a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {1}{G}. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, exile this card.)

—Taaveti of Kelsinko, elvish hunter

flavor_text:
"If you call the wolves, ensure you have a worthy hunt, or you may become the hunted."
—Taaveti of Kelsinko, elvish hunter

name: Steam Spitter

name: Blizzard Specter
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Blizzard Specter deals combat damage to a player, choose one —

• That player discards a card.

name: Deepfire Elemental
oracle_text: {X}{X}{1}: Destroy target artifact or creature with converted mana cost X.
flavor_text:
"There are deep, deep places in this world that have long burned hot with little regard for the whitening of the earth's thin skin."
—Sek'Kuar, Deathkeeper

name: Diamond Faerie
oracle_text: Flying
{1}{S}: Snow creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)
flavor_text:
"That such delicate creatures could become so powerful in the embrace of winter is yet more proof that I am right."
—Heidar, Rimewind master

name: Garza Zol, Plague Queen
oracle_text: Flying, haste
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Garza Zol, Plague Queen this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Garza Zol.
Whenever Garza Zol deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

name: Juniper Order Ranger
oracle_text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature and a +1/+1 counter on Juniper Order Ranger.
flavor_text: To protect the alliance between Kjeldor and Yavimaya, they trained in the ways of both.

name: Sek'Kuar, Deathkeeper
oracle_text: Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, create a 3/1 black and red Graveborn creature token with haste.
flavor_text: Karplusan legend told of an orc so cruel that he burned his own followers in rage—yet so revered that they rose from their pyres to serve him.

name: Tamanoa
oracle_text: Whenever a noncreature source you control deals damage, you gain that much life.
flavor_text: When Freyalise spoke the World Spell, the tamanoa rose to bring a new morning to Terisiare.

name: Vanish into Memory
oracle_text: Exile target creature. You draw cards equal to that creature's power. At the beginning of your next upkeep, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. If you do, discard cards equal to that creature's toughness.
flavor_text: Out of sight, into mind.

name: Wilderness Elemental
oracle_text: Trample
Wilderness Elemental's power is equal to the number of nonbasic lands your opponents control.
flavor_text:
"Don't be so quick to reclaim the thawing lands. They might have acquired a taste for freedom."
—Taaveti of Kelsinko, elvish hunter

name: Zur the Enchanter
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Zur the Enchanter attacks, you may search your library for an enchantment card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put it onto the battlefield. If you do, shuffle your library.

name: Coldsteel Heart
oracle_text: Coldsteel Heart enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.
flavor_text: The Phyrexian death machine awoke, its coldsteel heart imbuing it with sinister new power.

name: Jester's Scepter
oracle_text: When Jester's Scepter enters the battlefield, exile the top five cards of target player's library face down. You may look at those cards for as long as they remain exiled.
{2}, {T}, Put a card exiled with Jester's Scepter into its owner's graveyard: Counter target spell if it has the same name as that card.

—Heidar, Rimewind master

name: Phyrexian Snowcrusher

flavor_text: Its plow wasn't designed for snow, but to carve a path through shrieking armies.

name: Phyrexian Soulgorger
oracle_text: Cumulative upkeep—Sacrifice a creature. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

name: Thrumming Stone
oracle_text: Spells you cast have ripple 4. (Whenever you cast a spell, you may reveal the top four cards of your library. You may cast any revealed cards with the same name as the spell without paying their mana costs. Put the rest on the bottom of your library.)

flavor_text:
"A realm once green now ruled by Frost,
Where flesh and field both pay its cost.
Those dearly loved, forever lost . . ."
—The Dynasty of Winter Kings

name: Boreal Shelf

{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
flavor_text:
"Who will stay the Tyrant's hand,
As ice and woe both grip our land?
The helpless feel his frozen brand."
—The Dynasty of Winter Kings

When Dark Depths has no ice counters on it, sacrifice it. If you do, create a legendary 20/20 black Avatar creature token with flying and indestructible named Marit Lage.

name: Frost Marsh

flavor_text:
"Now caged in Winter's bitter chill,
Our people cry, their voices shrill—
Eternal cold breaks down their will."
—The Dynasty of Winter Kings

name: Highland Weald
oracle_text: Highland Weald enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.
flavor_text:
"Our noble land, enslaved by Rime,
Is it our fate to freeze through time?
If this be true, oh wicked crime."
—The Dynasty of Winter Kings
